description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller to request permission to start the plane's engines. This is the first step before a flight.
A pilot makes this call to the ground controller to request permission to move the plane on the ground from the gate to the runway.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to holding point
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, {taxi via O-P-M} to holding point RWY-16, {QNH 746}.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Taxi to holding point
calls.message: {Taxi via O-P-M} to holding point RWY-16, {QNH 746}, {Call Sign}.

description: A pilot requests clearance for a specific area and is instructed to contact the tower.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Area NL1, contact tower
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, area NL1, contact tower 123.2.

description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to request permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Lineup and wait
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, lineup runway 16, report ready for departure.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: lineup and wait
calls.message: Lineup runway 16, report ready for departure, {Call Sign}.

description: A pilot informs the tower they are ready and receives final clearance for takeoff with wind and area information.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, area NH1, 1000ft, S/W 210/06 kts, cleared for takeoff Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff
calls.message: Area NH1, 1000ft, S/W 210/06 kts, cleared for takeoff Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The tower confirms the aircraft is airborne and instructs the pilot to report when abeam a specific waypoint.
The pilot reports being abeam a waypoint and requests to switch to the training frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Abeam Z2, request change
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are abeam Z2, like to change to training.
